item.title: What is Git?
item.description: Git can be thought of as a virtual pen drive. Just like with a normal pendrive you can store files in it. However, it comes with a few awesome capabilities. Since it is a virtual pen drive, it can be easily duplicated. At this point you might be wondering - How is this different than DropBox or Google Drive? It’s quite similar - both DropBox and Git can be used to store files.
